::Reptilica/Bloodystrike/DevilDuer::

Reptilica growls. "Allright, this guy's pissin' me off," says the Alliance 
bot, flying back behind Serge.

He aims at the back of the T-rex, firing one missile at the base of his neck, 
and one at his back. With any luck, it'd cause the Maximal to drop Inzola.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Bloodystrike growls, flying down behind Blender, both guns blazing. Several 
heavy-fire shots make their way toward Blender, a few dozen rapid-fire ones 
accompanying them.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DevilDuer spins around as he hears Stronghold's voice. He growls, aiming his 
gun at Stronghold and firing shot after shot.
